import React from "react"; import "./Uploads.scss"; import axios from "axios"; // import Placeholder from ""; function Uploads({uploadHandler}) { uploadHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('/video', { upload: { title: e.target.title.value, description: e.target.description.value, image: e.target.img.src } }) .then(success => console.log(success)) .catch(err => console.error(err)) e.target.reset() } return (

Upload Video

VIDEO THUMBNAIL
TITLE YOUR VIDEO
ADD A VIDEO DESCRIPTION
); } export default Uploads;
